mapper.select: select * from springboard order by num desc
select * from springboard where ${searchName} like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into springboard(num,author,title,content,bwrite,readcnt) values((select max(num) + 1 from springboard ali), #{author},#{title},#{content},now(),0)
mapper.update: update springboard set readcnt=readcnt + 1 where num=#{num}
update springboard set author=#{author}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where num=#{num}
